URSSI Implementation Plan Karthik Ram Jeffrey Carver Sandra Gesing Daniel S. Katz Nic Weber 2020-02-14 Welcome This is a minimal intro to the URSSI implementation plan. This public report is a very early outline of the final report. Many of these sections are under internal review before being posted here. We expect sections to be posted by late March 2020.
